description: Token count frequency distributions across 397 Claude Code sessions (472 files, 75 empty). Buckets are nearest power of two. Frequencies sum to 1.0.

input_tokens_per_turn.description: Estimated input tokens per user turn (user text + tool results, chars/4). Only non-empty turns included.

generated_tokens_per_turn.description: Output tokens per user turn (from API usage.output_tokens, includes text + tool calls + thinking). Only non-empty turns included.
